Hi John

I just watched your AngularJS play by play Pluralsight session with Ken. Firstly, what a fantastic video - I thoroughly enjoyed it!

I have been “doing” (so to speak) AngularJS for a few weeks now for my company and I learned a lot of cool things including John’s best practices and debugging tools/techniques.

The reason why I ask is that the project I’ve slipped into is getting rather HUGE and I get the feeling that an architectural/design decision was not made on functionality but rather on “hey…angular seems kinda cool” :)

Where do you draw the line when deciding between ASP.NET MVC and AngularJS?

It would mean the world to me to hear your thoughts on the subject.
